title: Exploring Machine Learning Hardware Accelerators: Simulation and Project-Based Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Visualizes CNN/RNN architectures and hardware design principles through VR simulations, with collaborative learning facilitated by cloud-based LMS.

learning_goals: Explain the hardware accelerator design principles of CNN/RNN/ANN architectures using simulation tools
Compare and analyze performance metrics of hardware accelerators (processing speed, power consumption, area efficiency)
Design and simulate an FPGA-based machine learning accelerator model in teams and evaluate its performance
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
